sense.def:
Kadar neki material ali snov
insulates something
, ohranja stalno temperaturo nečesa, tako da tisto pokrije z debelo plastjo.

seg.quote: The function of a mammal's hair is to insulate the body.

sense.def:
To insulate a person
pomeni zavarovati nekoga pred škodljivimi stvarmi;

seg.quote: They could insulate the local population from these dangerous influences.
...in a sheltered, womb-like world, insulated against the events of life outside.

sense.def:
To insulate an electrical device
pomeni pokriti električno napravo z gumo ali plastiko, da električni tok ne bi mogel teči skoznjo in stresti osebe, ki jo uporablja.
